home.metaDescription: Create and manage your own Solana tokens with ease using DevLaunch platform

hero.title: Launch your token on Solana with ease
hero.subtitle: DevLaunch provides the simplest way to create, manage and transfer tokens on the Solana blockchain.

features.title: Platform Features
features.subtitle: Discover what DevLaunch can do for your project

tokenCreation.title: Simple Token Creation
tokenCreation.description: Create your own token in minutes with just a few clicks, no coding required.

transactions.title: Easy Transfers
transactions.description: Send tokens to anyone with a Solana wallet with our simple transfer interface.

identity.title: Token Identity
identity.description: Build trust with a verified token identity including social media links and project details.

verification.title: Community Verification
verification.description: Get your token verified by the community to increase visibility and trust.

liquidity.title: Liquidity Solutions
liquidity.description: Easily create liquidity pools and get your token trading on decentralized exchanges.

dashboard.title: Powerful Dashboard
dashboard.description: Track token performance, holder statistics, and transaction history in one place.

steps.title: How It Works
steps.subtitle: Get your token live on Solana in three simple steps

step1.title: Connect Your Wallet
step1.description: Connect your Solana wallet to our platform to get started.

step2.title: Create Your Token
step2.description: Fill in the token details like name, symbol, and supply.

step3.title: Launch & Manage
step3.description: Deploy your token and start managing transfers and holders.

roadmap.title: Platform Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Our vision for the future of DevLaunch

phase1.title: Token Creation & Management
phase1.description: Launch basic token creation and management features for Solana tokens.

phase2.title: Token Identity & Verification
phase2.description: Introduce token identity verification and community trust features.

phase3.title: Liquidity & Trading
phase3.description: Add liquidity pool creation and DEX integration for token trading.

phase4.title: Advanced Analytics & Marketing
phase4.description: Provide advanced analytics and marketing tools for token projects.

cta.title: Ready to Launch Your Token?
cta.description: Get started today and launch your Solana token in minutes.
